snippet: Horses from around the world, and the people who own and look after them, are getting the red carpet treatment as they arrive for the annual Group 1 races at the Sha Tin course on Sunday.
abstract: Horses from around the world, and people who own and look after them, are getting the red carpet treatment as they arrive in Hong Kong for the annual Hong Kong International Races.
lead_paragraph: Horses from around the world, and the people who own and look after them, are getting the red carpet treatment as they arrive for the annual Group 1 races at the Sha Tin course on Sunday.

headline.seo: Shipping Horses Is Risky, but Hong Kong International Races Prove Enticing
headline.main: Shipping Horses Is Risky, but Hong Kong Race Is Enticing
headline.print_headline: Shipping Horses Is Risky, but Hong Kong Race Is Enticing
